net.sourceforge.jibs.command
Interface JibsCommand

All Known Implementing Classes:
About_Command, Accept_Command, Address_Command, Away_Command, Back_Command, Board_Command, Cls_Command, Double_Command, Exit_Command, Invite_Command, Join_Command, Kibitz_Command, Leave_Command, Login_Command, Motd_Command, Move_Command, NImplemented_Command, Password_Command, Ratings_Command, Reject_Command, Resign_Command, Roll_Command, Set_Command, Shout_Command, Shutdown_Command, Tell_Command, Test_Command, Toggle_Command, Unknown_Command, Unwatch_Command, Watch_Command, Wave_Command, Whisper_Command, Who_Command, Whois_Command
public interface JibsCommand

This is the central interface all commands must implement.

Method Summary
 boolean execute(JibsServer jibsServer, Player player, String strArgs, String[] args)
          The method which jIBS invokes when it identifies a command.
 

Method Detail

execute

boolean execute(JibsServer jibsServer,
                Player player,
                String strArgs,
                String[] args)
The method which jIBS invokes when it identifies a command. All command implementation must perform their tasks under this routine.

Parameters:
jibsServer - calling server.
player - calling player.
strArgs - the argument as one big String.
args - the arguments as an array.
